attributes.action: Expand The Local Residents’ Discount Scheme Dartford / Essex River Crossing
attributes.additional_details:
Please sign this petition get the government to Expand The Local Residents’ Discount Scheme at the Dartford / Essex crossing to cover councils Like Brentwood, Romford, Bexley & Gravesend.
You can get cheaper crossings with the local residents scheme but only if you live with in Dartford & Thurrock Council boundaries.

This October 2014 the prices will increase
from £1.50 to £2.00 for car
from £2.00 to £2.50 for 2 axle goods vehicles
from £3.70 to £5.00 for heavy goods vehicles
And this is for a single crossing.

Can we get enough people to sign this so the government have to look at this we need this petition must reach 100,000 signatures within 30 days.
Please sign up and spread the word we can make a change use Twitter RT, Facebook, Phone anything.

This is people who live in these areas and have put up with the ever building traffic for many, many years
But have never had the benefit of discount travel because they live in the wrong side of the council boundary
